info.title: Queue Management System API
info.description: API for managing the live queue system (QMS), generating reports, and administering the system.

get.summary: Retrieves tokens issued today including cancelled, missed, and all statuses.
Call a token to scan which is in top of the queue.
Calls the next token in the queue.
Retrieves a list of missed tokens.
Retrieves the current token being served.

post.summary: Generates a new token for a customer.
Recalls a token from missed tokens on the position you want.
Removes a token from the live queue.
Completes process of a token from in process
Adjusts token position in live queue.
